name: ots
tagline: A self-hosted service for sharing secrets that expire after viewing
description: OTS (One Time Secret) is a self-hosted service for securely sharing sensitive information. Links expire after viewing, preventing reuse. It's ideal for sending passwords or credentials with privacy.

features.title: Media Library
features.description: Generate URLs that expire immediately after being viewed once to prevent reuse

features.title: End-to-End Encryption
features.description: Encrypt secrets client-side before transmission so the server never sees plaintext content

features.title: Password Protection
features.description: Add an additional password requirement to access secrets for extra security layer

features.title: Email Notifications
features.description: Optionally receive confirmation when a secret has been viewed and destroyed

features.title: REST API
features.description: Integrate secret sharing into applications and scripts using simple REST endpoints

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Keep sensitive data on your own infrastructure without trusting third-party services
